creditline: Lent by Temple of Aaron, St. Paul
description: cylinder with bulbous dome, lobed finial and two protruding posts topped with finials; chains ending in clapperless bells (and one jingle bell) hang from finials; allover repouss√© decoration of flowers and foliage; blue beads around top of cylinder; black velvet accents on both sides
dimension: H.43-1/4 x W.11-1/4 x D.11 in. (overall)
medium: silver, velvet, blue glass beads (case), goatskin parchment (scroll)
title: Torah Case and Torah
